text: Ahmed Hijazi (), sometimes spelled Ahmad or Hegazi, may refer to: * Ahmed Hijazi (poet) (born 1935), Egyptian contemporary poet * Ahmed Hijazi (cartoonist) (1936–2011), Egyptian satirical cartoonist * Ahmed Hijazi, alias of Kamal Derwish (1973–2002), American terrorist killed by CIA * Ahmad Hijazi (born 1994), Lebanese professional footballer * Ahmed Hegazi (footballer) (born 1991), Egyptian professional footballer * Ahmed Hegazi (actor) (1935–2002), Egyptian actor
title: Ahmed Hijazi
